snippet.title: The Outlast Trials - Official Trailer | IGN Fan Fest 2024
snippet.description:
Check out this latest gruesome trailer for The Outlast Trials ahead of the first-person psychological horror survival game's launch on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, and PC (via the Epic Games Store and Steam) on March 5, 2024. Developed and published by Red Barrels, The Outlast Trials is the third installment in the Outlast series, serving as a prequel to the first two games and it features test subjects in a mysterious Cold War experiment.

#IGN #Gaming #IGNFanFest
